mapper.sql: fid, fuid, fcountry, fname, fcode, ftype, fstatus, fcreatetime, fupdatetime,idCardZmImgURL,idCardFmImgURL,idCardScImgURL
mapper.update: update f_user_identity set fcountry = #{fcountry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fname = #{fname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fcode = #{fcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, idCardZmImgURL = #{idCardZmImgURL,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, idCardFmImgURL = #{idCardFmImgURL,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, idCardScImgURL = #{idCardScImgURL,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ftype = #{ftype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fstatus = #{fstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fupdatetime = #{fupdatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where fid = #{fid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
